ygData.subject: Re: [EQ-Monks] Essence of Dol, Batons, yatta yatta
ygData.msgSnippet: Is everyone dead?  I finally got the essence of Dol and baton.  I had to save up 3kp to get it.  (Luckily, my wife quit eq, so I got to sell all of her stuff,
ygData.messageBody:
Is everyone dead? I finally got the essence of Dol and baton. I had to save
up 3kp to get it. (Luckily, my wife quit eq, so I got to sell all of her stuff,
and managed to get 4.2kp out of it)

So, I'm hanging out in Dalnir, praying that I manage to get some crescent armor.

But, I've started jonesing for quests again. What level do I have to be to
start trying to get the Robe of the Lost circle? I'd prefer to go with a small
group of a bit higher than me (say a group of 3 35s-40s), or a full group of
low 30s.

Any chance in hell I can camp the spawns at that level?
